arts.sum: Monaco have been involved in some high-scoring games this season and Joe Casey is expecting more of the same when they host Manchester City in the Champions League.

arts.ttl: Man City’s “clearly improving” Rodri alternative praised before Monaco “three-pointers”
arts.sum: A “clearly improving” Manchester City players is a “safe and cautious” alternative to injured star Rodri for Wednesday’s Champions League trip to Monaco, Citizens expert Steven McInerney tells Sports Mole.
